Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Rooms with Direct dial telephone, Mini fridge, Music radio, Safe box, Balcony or terrace. Currency Exchange, 2 Tennis Courts, Table tennis, Dry cleaning & laundry, Beauty salon, Mini market, gift shop, jewellery, etc.

Important place or monument close to the hotel: Located 200m away from the beautiful beach of Kiotari, Rhodes town - 60km, Lindos - 12km, Rhodes harbour - 60km. Bus stop in front of the hotel, 4 times daily to Lindos and Rhodes. Nearest airport: 55km.
